resp = client.indices.create(
    index="index",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "query": {
                "type": "percolator"
            },
            "body": {
                "type": "text"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.indices.update_aliases(
    actions=[
        {
            "add": {
                "index": "index",
                "alias": "queries"
            }
        }
    ],
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.index(
    index="queries",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "query": {
            "match": {
                "body": "quick brown fox"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp2)
